author: luc
msg: Improved brackting utility for univariate solvers.
Bracketing utility for univariate root solvers now returns a tighter
interval than before. It also allows choosing the search interval
expansion rate, supporting both linear and asymptotically exponential

author: rjung
msg: Fix another "out of tree build" problem
for gen_test_char when using an old libtool.
No CHANGES needed, because similar issue already
